spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4 stacks of Platinum Plating for 30 sec, increasing your Armor by 11,257. Receiving more than 10% of your health from a Physical damage effect will remove one stack of Platinum Plating. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 5,486 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 251,184 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 2,954 Agility and absorbing 1.2 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Use: Teleports the caster to the Argent Tournament Grounds. (30 Min Cooldown)
